/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their red brick facades adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. Bare trees stand tall, their leafless branches reaching towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and creating a lens flare in the image. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the red bricks of the buildings contrasting against the blue sky. The bare trees add a touch of starkness to the scene. The sun's rays create a lens flare, adding a dynamic element to the image. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, capturing the city's architectural charm and natural beauty.
